title: Killing Karl
description: Doris Mathers experiences intimate, emotional torment at the hands of a serial killer â€¦ a man she calls her husband. Now her newborn daughter is missing.An abusive childhood had taught Doris that the only people appointed to protect her never would. Only she can stop the Keeper, a deviant with a penchant for cutting off limbs, and she will, no matter the cost.
author: Hilary Lauren
